harry_potter_books.title: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
harry_potter_books.author: J.K. Rowling
harry_potter_books.summary: Harry Potter discovers on his eleventh birthday that he is the orphaned son of two powerful wizards and possesses unique magical powers of his own.

harry_potter_books.title: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
harry_potter_books.author: J.K. Rowling
harry_potter_books.summary: Harry returns to Hogwarts for his second year and discovers a hidden chamber housing a terrible monster.

harry_potter_books.title: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
harry_potter_books.author: J.K. Rowling
harry_potter_books.summary: Harry learns that a dangerous prisoner named Sirius Black has escaped from Azkaban and is believed to be after him.

harry_potter_books.title: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
harry_potter_books.author: J.K. Rowling
harry_potter_books.summary: Harry unexpectedly becomes a participant in the Triwizard Tournament, a dangerous magical competition.

harry_potter_books.title: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
harry_potter_books.author: J.K. Rowling
harry_potter_books.summary: Harry and his friends form 'Dumbledore's Army' to fight against the dark forces gathering strength.

harry_potter_books.title: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
harry_potter_books.author: J.K. Rowling
harry_potter_books.summary: Harry learns more about Lord Voldemort's past and discovers a mysterious book marked as the property of the Half-Blood Prince.

harry_potter_books.title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows
harry_potter_books.author: J.K. Rowling
harry_potter_books.summary: Harry, Ron, and Hermione leave Hogwarts to find and destroy Voldemort's Horcruxes, culminating in a final battle at Hogwarts.
